core_constraints.name: sun_direction_constraint
core_constraints.description: Sun shines from south (direction (0,1)); walking with any southward component (dy < 0) causes sun exposure.

core_constraints.name: shade_protection
core_constraints.description: Inside any shaded rectangle, movement is safe regardless of direction.

core_constraints.name: axis_aligned_rectangles
core_constraints.description: Shaded areas are axis-aligned rectangles given by southwest and northeast corners; they do not touch or intersect.

core_constraints.name: movement_cost_only_in_sun
core_constraints.description: Only distance traveled outside shaded areas AND with southward movement component counts toward objective.

objective.description: Minimize total Euclidean distance walked while exposed to the sun (i.e., outside shade and moving southward).

invariant.name: visibility_graph_shortest_path
invariant.description: Optimal path consists of straight-line segments between critical points: start, end, and rectangle corners. Safe movement within shade allows free traversal inside rectangles.
